data.enText: a state of peaceful existence and agreement

data.chText: 同我们的环境协调的必要
data.enText: the need to be in harmony with our environment
to live together in perfect harmony
the way in which different notes that are played or sung together combine to make a pleasing sound

data.chText: 充满激情的歌词和绝妙的和声演唱
data.enText: passionate lyrics and stunning vocal harmonies
a pleasing combination of related things
the harmony of colour in nature

simple_means.memory_skill: harm 适合 + ony → 适合的状态 → 和谐

tr: the structure of music with respect to the composition and progression of chords
a harmonious state of things in general and of their properties (as of colors and sounds)
congruity of parts with one another and with the whole

value.def: If people are living in harmony with each other, they are living together peacefully rather than fighting or arguing.

example.ex: We must try to live in peace and harmony with ourselves and those around us...
example.tran: 我们必须努力和我们自己及周围的人和睦相处。

example.ex: He projected himself as the protector of national unity and harmony.
example.tran: 他把自己标榜成民族团结与和睦的捍卫者。

value.def: Harmony is the pleasant combination of different notes of music played at the same time.
The harmony of something is the way in which its parts are combined into a pleasant arrangement.

example.ex: He looked more relaxed, as if some of the harmony from his surroundings had flowed into him.
example.tran: 他看起来放松了些，仿佛周围的和谐环境感染了他。

value.tran: （各组成部分的）协调，和谐，调和

trans: 密集和声(声部紧靠在一起)

partsOfSpeech.dec: harm的变体，适合大家的就是有吸引力的
harm 适合 + on + ic …的 → 旋律适合的 → 和谐的
harmonic 和声的 + al 具有…性质的 → 和谐的；悦耳的
harm 适合 + ony → 适合的状态 → 和谐
